column5: INSG Russell 2000 added is leaking out
INSG unbelievable covering of shorts taking place IMHO End of June is comingdo what you wantyou cant stop time

Its not just the blatant manipulation and the folly of a market that reacts to every tweet Its more than the fact that the market has had an amazing 10 year run and could possibly go no where for the next several years I understand the stock market has been disconnected from reality for quite some time and I embraced it The bottom line is and normally I dont let economics influence what I am doing I dont want my money involved in a market that even for a second believes that we need a rate CUT Right there is reason enough for me to give up on long term investing Last by not least what has INSG done during this glorious rally the last few days My money has been sitting around doing nothing which bothers me and I feel like Im wasting time and opportunities else where I really do not want to own stocks when I can rent them for the day and make money and move on I sleep better now too Dump everything and join us live to profit

I have been pounding the table on non Huawei China names CIEN dominated earnings INSG is picking up a ton of carriers worldwide and have 30 engagements revenue will explode in 20 and 21 ERIC and NOK are taking share as well
